description: This file defines a root layout component and setup for a Remix application, including link management, meta tags, and structure for HTML document rendering.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides an array of link objects for preconnecting to font services and including stylesheets.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that sets up the HTML structure, including head meta tags and body content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Default React component rendering the Outlet for nested routes.
